name: Slime (itch) (melkan22)
description:
Made by Nate and Michael

Scientist 1: Hey there little buddy.
Scientist 1: Sorry to wake you.
Scientist 1: But it's time to measure your cognitive levels.
Slime: ~Slime noise~

Scientist 1: Oh a shes a feisty one.

Slime ...

Scientist 1: Just go ahead and make your way to the other end of the room.
Scientist 1:Be careful of that lightning...
Scientist 1: Get to near and you'll get Z A P E D!

Slime: ~Inquisitive slime noise~

Scientist 1: ...

Scientist 1:I don't know why we put the lightning there...

Scientist 1: Something about "It will look really cool if we have company over"

Scientist 2: Hey! Mom said that lighting will make us look "hip" and "cool"

Scientist 1: Ignore him this is NOT part of the test.

Slime: -_-

use wasd to move

hint: damage boost?
